reference.title: cxxStructDetail
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxStructDetail> element provides detailed information about the structure and behaviors of the C++ struct.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxStructDetail> element is defined within <cxxStruct>. In <cxxStructDetail> the <example> and <section> elements are provided to support the current specific C++ API reference. A struct body can contain declarations of the members of the struct, such as variables, claseses, structs, and functions.
